title: Create Interview - Job Description Input
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that the AI generates a complete job description
expected_result: The job description is generated and populated

title: Create Interview - Edit Job Description
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Edit the generated job description
expected_result: The edited job description is saved successfully

title: Create Interview - Skill Recommendations
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that the AI extracts key skills from the job description
expected_result: The skill recommendations are displayed and accurate

title: Create Interview - Add Custom Skills
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Add a custom skill (e.g., 2 years of experience in AWS)
expected_result: The custom skill is added successfully

title: Create Interview - Set Difficulty Level
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Set the difficulty level of the questions (e.g., hard, moderate)
expected_result: The difficulty level is set successfully

title: Create Interview - Suggest Questions
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that the AI suggests relevant questions
expected_result: The suggested questions are displayed and relevant

title: Create Interview - Standard Questions
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that standard questions are displayed
expected_result: Standard questions are displayed and can be personalized

title: Create Interview - Role-Based Questions
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Verify that role-based questions are displayed
expected_result: Role-based questions are displayed and can be modified

title: Create Interview - Create Option
steps: Navigate to the create interview page
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Click on the create option
expected_result: The interview is created successfully and a unique public link is generated

title: Create Interview - Advanced Plan - AI Avatar
steps: Navigate to the create interview page (advanced plan)
Enter a valid job title (e.g., JavaScript developer with AWS experience)
Click on the enhanced JD feature
Select an AI avatar
expected_result: The AI avatar is selected and lip syncing aligns with the script

title: Test Responses Tab
steps: Visit the responses tab
Verify structured answers and video recordings are present
Verify scores and resumes are displayed
expected_result: Structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes are displayed in the responses tab

title: Test Interview Scoring
steps: Click on the interview screenings section
Verify AI analyzed scores are displayed
expected_result: AI analyzed scores are displayed in the interview screenings section

title: Test Candidate Summary
steps: Verify the comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed
Verify observations, positives, and negatives are noted
expected_result: Comprehensive summary of the interview with observations, positives, and negatives is displayed

title: Test Action Button
steps: Verify the action button to select or reject the candidate is present
Click on the action button and verify it works as expected
expected_result: Action button to select or reject the candidate is functional

title: Test Ré Screening
steps: Upload a set of résumés against a job description
Verify the AI commences the screening process
expected_result: AI screening process is initiated after uploading résumés against a job description

title: Test Ré Score
steps: Verify the ré score is displayed
Verify the score is based on skills rather than résumé similarity
expected_result: Ré score is displayed and based on skills rather than résumé similarity

title: Test AI Recommendations
steps: Verify the AI provides a recommendation for the candidate
Verify the recommendation is based on the suitability of the resume
expected_result: AI provides a recommendation for the candidate based on the suitability of the resume

title: Test Interview Link
steps: Verify the interview link is sent to the candidate
Verify the interview link is valid for 24 hours
expected_result: Interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours
